name: la maŝino - ( esperanto: "the machine" )
description:
A man spends all of his days operating a massive machine of unfathomable purpose.

How to operate the machine:

- Follow the lighted instructions given to you each day in your room to complete your tasks for the day.

CONTROLS

WASD / Arrows : Move, and Climb Ladders

Mouse Click and Drag : Interact with objects

CREDITS:

Andrew Hagel ( andrewhagel.com ) - Programming, Character, Animation

Alex Yao ( ragtagradical.com ) - Environment, Audio
